basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time，flower color orange
basic.color: Leaf coverd with white powder and leaf color will turn pink with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, temporary dormancy in summer, planted in half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
